questions.question: This classic horror story written by Mary Shelley was about a mad scientist attempting to create life.
The Cthulhu Mythos was created by this prolific writer of "weird tales".
All copies of this 1922 unlicensed Dracula movie were later ordered to be destroyed after a lawsuit by Bram Stoker's heirs.
The Mummy, portrayed by Boris Karloff, is a story about this ancient Egyptian priest coming back to life.
In the Edgar Allan Poe story "A predicament", originally called "Scythe of time", a woman is beheaded by this (the head later gives a speech, but the woman can't hear it because she now lacks ears).
